definition.name: AspectRatio
definition.description: A component that maintains a consistent aspect ratio for its content. It wraps around content to ensure it maintains the specified width-to-height ratio, which is particularly useful for responsive images, videos, or other media content that needs to maintain specific proportions across different screen sizes.

ratio.description: The desired ratio of width to height (default is 1)

children.description: The content to maintain the aspect ratio for

definition.visualLayout: The component creates a container that maintains the specified aspect ratio, with the child content filling the available space while maintaining the proper proportions.
definition.implementationNotes: This component is a wrapper around Radix UI's AspectRatio primitive, providing a simple way to maintain consistent aspect ratios in the UI. It's particularly useful for preventing content from becoming distorted during responsive layout changes.
